price: Atëherë, a është njësoj si Ai që krijon, si ai që nuk krijon?! A nuk po merrni vesh?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: afaman yakhluqu kaman lā yakhluqu afalā tadhakkarūna
